channel.title: Generative modelling on Hugo Cisneros
channel.description: Recent content in Generative modelling on Hugo Cisneros

item.title: Generative adversarial networks
item.description: tags Neural networks, Generative modelling Generative adversarial networks are a type of generative model. It is close in spirit to Variational autoencoders, but has key differences. The main one is the way the model is trained, which uses an adversarial equilibrium between training a generator and training a discriminator. Are GANs glorified PCA? (Richardson and Weiss 2020) This paper seems to show that image-to-image translation models are ill-posed and imply the image transformation should always be very local.
